title: New York Daily News masthead & headline type
content:
Morning,

Looking for ID on the main masthead font (Daily News) and the headline font (Hate Mailer Targets Jeter). Any info will be much appreciated.

Thanks,  
Alyce

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Masthead.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141017164837/http:/typophile.com/files/Masthead.gif) | 7.75 KB |
| [169-0926bigfront.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141017164837/http:/typophile.com/files/169-0926bigfront.jpg) | 29.34 KB |
author: alyce

comments.content:
The headline font is close to Franklin Gothic but not an exact match for any version I can find.

The masthead was surely custom drawn.

The masthead kind of resembles an extended Baskerville, maybe that was a starting point.

Tim
